website_summaries.verdict: Nothing fancy, but it gets the job done. Many jobs, actually.
pros: Functions as cake stand, salad bowl, punch bowl, chip and dip server, veggie-n-dip server, snack tray
Acrylic plastic cake stand with domed cover
cons: Labeled "dishwasher-safe," but users recommend hand washing if you want it to last

customer_reviews.title: Cake Stand That‘s Not Used for Cakes
customer_reviews.text: I have to confess that I did not buy this for a cake stand. You see I have a lazy Susan on my kitchen counter on which I keep a number of bottles of vitamins and supplements. For a reason I may never understand, my cat suddenly decide that she wanted to take them too. A mess! I bought this to use as a cover over the bottles so that I could see them but keep the cat out. I haven’t had a problem since and it takes nothing away from the looks of my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Love how it is multi-use and light
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son's 1st birthday party. Prior to having our baby, I would definitely had preferred a glass version of this. However, now that we have a young child, it doesn't make sense for us to have a glass version. I appreciate not having to carry a heavier dish or having to worry about breaking glass around kids. I love how versatile this is and can't wait to use it for all of its multiple functions.
customer_reviews.author: mkysayTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  The one item you will keep on hand in your kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE! This product is wonderful! I keep it right in my kitchen in a cabinet because I can use it for various purposes! No more running down to my basement for a large bowl or platter! It is great to use for those unexpected guests. The veggie platter area is easy to fill with a small about of fruit or veggies, but it looks stunning! The non grass materials make it great to have outside by the pool. I plan on getting more to have on hand for gift giving!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Must GET!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cake stand it's so versatile and it looks great on the table. It's made from plastic but it's hard and clear. It is durable but breakable if you drop it, so try not too. lol. My item arrived intact and ready to go. I have given this as a housewarming gift and Xmas gifts. You'll love taking this and using this for all your parties and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Kymi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! This cake stand has so many functions you ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! This cake stand has so many functions you can easily switch out. The acrylic is great quality and appears like glass, but it very lightweight. Having used a heavy glass cake stand for years, this one will be much easier to lift and actually use as well as clean without worrying about dropping it in the sink and having it crack. Wonderful cake stand and would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: greenwillow2012

customer_reviews.title: It is very beautiful and looks high price
customer_reviews.text: This cake stand is definately multifunctional. It is very clever how they made it that way. It is very beautiful and looks high price. I saw the exact replicia of this at a friends house but it was glass. She wished her children had bought one like mine -vs- the glass one she received as a gift...
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: We use this a lot
customer_reviews.text: We have used for veggie's & cakes but 90% of the time we use it for pies, especially during the harvest season (always have a pie in it).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It is indeed multifunctional but it's made of plastic. From being clear (surface and material), it will eventually become cloudy over time. Overall, for how much we paid, it's not worth it. You can find glass ones for the same price at Homegoods.
customer_reviews.author: Lou&Z

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Cake Stand that was not glass to be my everyday goodie holder. This is a really neat cake stand. It can be a chip and dip tray also. It looks very nice, it's hard to tell it's not glass until you pick up the lid. I will only be hand washing this just to ensure it stays in good shape. Overall I am very pleased for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenix23

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this at first, since you can use it in quite a few formations and for different things. However, it scratches easily. Plus no matter how much I scrub it, it seems to feel greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great party tray/ cake plate
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful device. I used it for cake one day and veggie tray the next. Going to buy for all my daughters.
customer_reviews.author: ph

customer_reviews.title: Lovely on Table
customer_reviews.text: 10 Stars!...... Multi use item......... Very attractive on table.... Nice weight, not heavy like those made of glass which is great for someone with upper body weakness or disability.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K. & Happy Grandpup

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Its great for cakes or for veggies and dip. Looks really pretty too.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Like Glass, But Much Lighter!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is of a high-impact plastic, or probably acrylic. A glass cake stand looks so good, but is definitely much heavier. That is why we opted for the acrylic version. Looks good and is easy to handle & maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Rangerbob

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cake stand. i love how it can be used for other entertainment ways.

customer_reviews.title: Great great great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great look!! Beautiful and easy to use day by day!!!

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Its just as versatile as advertised and I don't have to worry about breaking it like my last glass one.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We use it at work for customer treats and love it!

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Did not want glass due to transportation issues. Versatile piece, nicely made. Well worth the price. Attractive.

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I wanted. It is nice looking and lightweight, and keeps pastries fresh. I use it daily for my B&B guests.

customer_reviews.title: Clear enough it looks just like glass, but plastic enough I don't have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Clear enough it looks just like glass, but plastic enough I don't have to watch it like a hawk if a little one is near it. Glass is great, but children and glass things aren't a great pairing, unless you're a masochist.

customer_reviews.title: I love this. It's plastic
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It's plastic , but good quality for the price. I really like the size and the multi functional use. I will use this a lot. Good for the price!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect trifle bowl for a large trifle
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for for my special trifle dessert! I can also see that I will be using it for many other things.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Cracked in the Mail
customer_reviews.text: The dome had a 2 inch crack when I opened it, and I thought it would be glass not plastic. I can still use the dish for salads and veggie plates.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not tall enough for a 3 layer cake as described.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: It is nice. My only issue is that the material is so light that the lid slips a little even though there are bumps in the plastic to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole C.

customer_reviews.title: Perlili cake stand
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the Perlili cake stand. I especially like the multifunctional aspects.

customer_reviews.title: easy to leave on counter
customer_reviews.text: Not expensive, easy to leave on counter, but doesn't sit inside the edge tightly.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: With multiple use this is a wonderful item to have. Looks nice and sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: she LOVED IT, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Surprised the wife with this, she LOVED IT, perfect size, and the multi use is a big PLUS.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for work and we used it for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work and we used it for about a month until it suddenly just cracked in half!! Not sure what happened or why, just know we heard a loud POP sound and went in to see what it was, and the platter had cracked right down the middle :(

customer_reviews.text: The Cake Stand was as shown and delivery was very prompt.

customer_reviews.text: Gave my daughter this for Mother's Day. She loves it '

customer_reviews.text: Completely functional item that arrived in perfect condition. Works exactly as described

customer_reviews.title: I use it as a fruit holder and it looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. I use it as a fruit holder and it looks great!

customer_reviews.text: I thought this was glass but it is heavy plastic .... Love it :)

customer_reviews.text: We use this in our salon for our clients to have a sweet treat!

customer_reviews.text: Ordered by my wife and it is crystal clear and will be very useful. Arrived in perfect shape!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty cute and at first glance it looks like its made out of glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it for my cakes so far. It works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Lesui

customer_reviews.title: This is nice looking and multi-functional
customer_reviews.text: This is nice looking and multi-functional. If you are looking for a vegetable tray, the lid and bowl are fairly secure together. However, as a cake stand that is not the case. I thought that the lid would be more secure on the plate. I returned the product and my refund was $14.09. I am really sorry that I purchased the product in the first place. This was the first time that I did not receive a full refund for one of my purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this item!
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for my kitchen, better than it has to be for the price. Very clear, appears as glass but much lighter and safer. I use it in my kitchen to display and protect cakes, pies, cookies. I like the modest height of this stand. Great to show off the special dessert you made for your company, and to display at potlucks. So much nicer than a plate! The tray and dip option is a perfect size to still fit on the table, and use the dome lid to protect your fresh veggies or fruits and dips on your patio or picnic. I will be buying this set again as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: drdoug

customer_reviews.title: Perlli - Cake Stand Multifunctional Serving...
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at the quality of the material when I initially opened it. It is made of very strong (hard) plastic and is very durable. I dropped the cover when I was taking it out of the box and it did not chip or break. It is extremely easy to put together. I have already used it for several events and several folks want to know where I purchased it. This clear cake stand is a W I N N E R ! I also use it to put fruit in it. My wife prefers cakes or cookies in it ...
customer_reviews.author: moondoggie

customer_reviews.title: Piece of cake!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend a ton on a cake stand, so I opted for this plastic one and I'm glad I did. The plastic is thick and sturdy. There are little nubs all the way around the outside of the platter that hold the lid in place so you don't get icing everywhere. The dome height is nice and roomy for a large two-layer cake. It sits about 3-inches above your counter which makes it super easy to apply icing. It also cleaned up easily. I just used mild soap and water and it was dry almost immediately. Piece of cake!
customer_reviews.author: Buffy615

customer_reviews.title: This is so cool!
customer_reviews.text: I don't need a cake stand often, but I had a party that I wanted to use it for. This items is awesome since I can get more use out of it with the different setups. I have only used it twice for cakes but it presented them beautifully. Everyone thought it was made of glass until they touched it! I have since used it numerous times as a veggie platter and a punch bowl. Good quality, seems like it will last well and was easy to clean. Why buy a plain cake stand when you can get one that triples it's uses! I also thought the price very reasonable. I would recommend this item to all.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Looks like glass. Fits my 10 1/2” cake stand. I only bought for the cover. I could not find a separate one to fit that size. Looks great. The glass ones were either to expensive or ugly. I wanted something simple. I wish this was higher for my higher layer cakes. That was why the 4 stars. The manufacturer should make separate covers that are higher in two diameters ( as it was hard for me to find one for mine) and I bet they can sell a lot. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: lynnar

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, but wash with care
customer_reviews.text: So, I got this and used it almost immediately to serve food at a donation lunch. I used it as both a salad bowl and a party tray and it worked very well. My only complaint is that it seemed to get pretty beat up in the dishwasher. In the future, I will just be washing it by hand. (I've set it up as a cake stand, but haven't really used it that way yet) Still very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jon flannery

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Eh it's ok. It is what it says it is, but I barely dropped it and it cracked, the bowl part which is also the stand keeps slipping out so don't grab it by the stand or you will lose your cake. For $22 I could have bought a glass one. I feel this is more like a $12 price range.
customer_reviews.author: Adam and Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: its pretty hardy plastic and i think my friend will get ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for someone. I looked at it first to make sure it was ok. its pretty hardy plastic and i think my friend will get good use of it. if your looking for a glass alternative this seems to be a good one, plus it has the other uses than just the cake stand.
customer_reviews.author: chris kolasa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like that it's multifunctional, pretty, easy to clean and did not break or crack when dropped

customer_reviews.title: Good multi functional stand but if you use a metal ...
customer_reviews.text: Good multi functional stand but if you use a metal knife to cut cake it will predictably leave scratch marks on the plastic. Not sure there is a great solution to that given most cake knives are metal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. It works well and has a nice ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It works well and has a nice design to it. Can use it for more than just cake. I like that it's made out of plastic. I leave it out on my counter because I'm always making goodies and I worried about a glass one getting shattered by one of my kids. So this definitely works best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after one use
customer_reviews.text: It's plastic -- I should have been more diligent when reading the product description. Don't shop with your eyes via only images....stop to read the description. Used it once as a relish/dip tray - already cracked.
customer_reviews.author: robin roberts

customer_reviews.title: Baked Goods Never Looked So Good
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this type of cake stand when watching Fixer Upper on TV. Everything looks so much more inviting when displayed this way rather than being hidden in tins or other packaging. I like that this is lightweight and looks just the way I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than I expected because I did not read the description. I wanted to use it for a 12in cake. The plate is large enough, but the dome is only about 10in. No problem because I don't make 12in cakes often. I haven't used it, but I like the possibility of multiple uses. I expect to get a lot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is multifunctional
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product several times already. I like that it is multifunctional. It works perfectly as a cake stand and also perfectly as a chip and dip. Very nice product. I wish I could find one just like this but in glass instead of plastic.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking cake cover
customer_reviews.text: Looks good is what it was advertised as.. Cake cover is a little tickey to get centered on the platter but can work with it.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purchase

customer_reviews.title: It is nice for the price and I do not have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Once again I made an error in that I thought it was glass!!! It is nice for the price and I do not have to worry about dropping it and breaking it. At least I hope I don't drop it and it breaks.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect plastic cake stand

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

product_meta.title: Cake Stand Multifunctional Serving Platter and Cake Plate With Dome - 6 Uses - Perlli
product_meta.description:
Description 

Acrylic Multi Function Serving Piece This durable acrylic serving piece can serve many functions with its chic and smart design. Its versatility allows for a single piece to be used as a cake display with domed cover, a salad bowl with attached sectioned dish, a chip n dip platter, a punch bowl and so much more! User your creativity with this chic piece, which will make a statement when used as a center piece or on a buffet table at your party. Constructed of high strength durable acrylic and is dishwasher safe. 

Cake Stand 

Make an impressive statement with this 12" cake stand suitable for large and small cakes. The included domed lid keeps cake fresh, and adds an attractive flair to the dish. 

Chip 'N Dip Platter 

This chip 'n dip platter features a 4 sectioned dish which can be filled with crackers, chips, cut up veggies and more. The center bowl is a perfect size for any dipping condiments. 

Punch Bow 

To transform info a punch bowl, simply invert the domed lid and insert into the center dip bowl to create a large punch bowl. The attached 4 section dish can be used for cut up fruit and garnishes. 

Salad Bowl 

Just like the punch bowl, the salad bowl is used by inserting the domed lid into the center dip bowl. The bowl is used for lettuce , and the sectioned dish is a great way to offer cut up veggies by type, in a fun 'create your own salad' platter! 

Dimensions: 

Cake Dome Inside - 10.4" Diameter x 4.3" Height 
Cake Display Base - 12" Diameter 
Dip Bowl - 4.3" Diameter x 1.7" Height 
Punch Bowl - 10.4" Diameter x 4.3" Depth
feature_bullets: ACRYLIC PLASTIC Cake Stand plate with dome cover can serve multiple purposes! Measures approximately 12 inches in diameter. Dishwasher Safe.
DOMED CAKE STAND: Pedestal cake Platter with Lid cover can be used for serving and keeping cake fresh
SALAD BOWlL: Cake dome can be flipped over and attached to sectional dish for a serving bowl with attached 4 section tray base. Great for salads and crackers, or a mini create your own salad bar,
PUNCH BOWL: Cake dome can also function as a punch bowl or cocktail holder,with attached sectional dish used a variety of fruit garnishes or treats.
CHIP AND DIP SERVER: Tray can also be inverted for a sectional chip n dip serving tray

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars139 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
